query.name: location_get_space_plan_equipment
query.sql:
SELECT &ifp_location_space_plans;.location_id, &ifp_equipment;.*, &ifp_equipment_types;.name, &ifp_equipment_type_images;.equipment_type_image_id, &ifp_location_equipment;_position.*, (&ifp_locations;.name) as location_address_name FROM (uplink_location_space_plan, &ifp_equipment;, &ifp_equipment_types;, &ifp_location_equipment;, &ifp_location_equipment;_position, uplink_locations, &ifp_equipment_type_images;)
WHERE &ifp_equipment;.equipment_type_id = &ifp_equipment_types;.equipment_type_id AND &ifp_equipment;.equipment_id=&ifp_location_equipment;.equipment_id AND &ifp_location_equipment;.location_id=uplink_locations.location_id AND uplink_location_space_plan.location_space_plan_id=? AND &ifp_location_equipment;.location_id=? AND uplink_locations.location_id=uplink_location_space_plan.location_id AND &ifp_location_equipment_position;.location_equipment_id=&ifp_location_equipment;.location_equipment_id AND &ifp_equipment_type_images;.equipment_type_id=&ifp_equipment;.equipment_type_id AND &ifp_equipment_type_images;.default_image='1'
GROUP BY equipment_id
